name: Rocket Golf
description: Rocket Golf is a game that brings a new dimension to the traditional game of golf. Choose a launcher instead of a club. Pull a trigger instead of taking a swing. Through the game we take you from classic courses to environments you never imagined playing golf within. Thanks for coming!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2.6 GHz single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
